Itachi exhales a meteor-sized sphere of fire that carries the enemy away and causes a massive explosion on impact.<ref>''Naruto'' gamebook, page 85</ref> The impact causes the ground around Itachi to break apart while he remains unfazed. This is much like [[Fire Release: Great Fireball Technique]], but a larger and more destructive version.
